item.title: A Country GDP Vs. Its Fertility and Mortality Rates
item.description: I want to see whether there is a relationship between a country’s GDP and its fertility and mortality rates. With the assumption: higher GDP corresponds with lower fertility and mortality rates, I will use data from World Bank Group to analyze using a regression model. I recreated this project from my CMSE class but improved it by applying a fundamental data science project’s outline. For in-depth step-by-step code analysis, the repository for this project can be found here.
